transformation: Numeric cast from validated numeric input
description: Annual salary as numeric value (in original currency).
Final currency code used for FX conversions.

transformation: Currency resolution logic applied to currency_other
description: Cleaned currency code derived from currency_other free text input.

transformation: Converted using official TRM (USD to COP)
description: Annual salary converted to COP using USD to COP TRM for the run date.
Annual salary converted to USD using FX rates for the run date.

transformation: rules to mark Unknown and Title Case for valid entries
description: Standardized city name with invalid entries marked as 'Unknown'.
Additional annual monetary compensation as numeric value (in original currency).

transformation: Converted to COP using currency_final mapped to rates_to_cop
description: Additional annual monetary compensation converted to COP using FX rates for the run date.

transformation: Sum of salary_COP and compensation_COP (NaN treated as 0 for aggregation)
description: Total annual compensation in COP (salary_COP + compensation_COP).
